title: Add backend guards for state/lang and numeric parsing
description: Add backend guards for invalid/missing `state` and `lang`, and treat required numeric fields as required (avoid `parseFloat(...) || 0` masking invalid input).
acceptance_criteria:
1. Unknown `state` or `lang` returns a controlled, localized error (no crash).
2. Missing required numeric fields return `errorRequired` and do not default to 0.
3. Optional fields only default when explicitly intended.

title: Fix salt-chlorine advice markup and Spanish translation
description: Fix malformed salt-pool advice markup and incorrect Spanish translation in `calculator.js`.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Salt-pool advice HTML has no stray closing tags (no visible "/em" in UI).
2. Spanish `saltChlorineBelowTarget` is translated correctly (not Italian).
3. Salt-pool advice renders correctly for low chlorine cases.

title: Sync UI version strings with README changelog
description: Header/footer show v1.15.7 (Nov 20, 2025) while README ends at v1.14.1. Align displayed version and documented changelog to prevent confusion.
acceptance_criteria:
1. README version history matches UI header/footer version.
2. If version is changed, update all displayed locations consistently (index footer + header + any other pages).

title: Restrict static hosting and relocate user activity log
description: Current `express.static(__dirname)` serves the entire repo, and `calculator.js` writes `user_activity.log` into that served tree. This can expose user inputs and internal files (.beads, .ntm, node_modules) over HTTP.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Static server only serves intended public assets (e.g., a dedicated public root).
2. GET `/user_activity.log` returns 404 (log stored outside public root or disabled).
3. Internal folders (.beads, .ntm, node_modules) are not web-accessible.

title: Remove JSX-style comments from volume calculator markup/SVG
description: Replace JSX-style comments (`{/* ... */}`) in `volume_calculator.html` and SVG template strings in `volume_script.js` with valid HTML/SVG comments or remove them.
acceptance_criteria:
1. `rg -n "{/*"` returns no matches.
2. Volume diagrams render with no stray comment text.

title: Align validation ranges and error copy across UI/backend
description: Validation rules and copy differ between HTML attributes, client-side checks, and server-side checks (e.g., capacity min 100 vs 500; temperature min 32 vs 50). Align min/max and requiredness, and make optional fields truly optional.
acceptance_criteria:
1. The same min/max ranges are enforced in HTML, client validation, and backend validation.
2. Optional fields (TDS/temperature if intended) do not block submission when blank.
3. Error messages match the actual enforced ranges.
notes: Decision needed: confirm intended minima for capacity, alkalinity, and temperature (currently inconsistent across UI/README/backend).
